amendment.description: To limit the amount authorized to be expended from the Highway Trust Fund in any fiscal year to the amount anticipated to be deposited into the Highway Trust Fund in that fiscal year.

action.text: Amendment SA 621 under the order of 9/15/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 14 - 84. Record Vote Number: 136.

Amendment SA 621 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S5666-5668; text: CR S5666) To limit the amount authorized to be expended from the Highway Trust Fund in any fiscal year to the amount anticipated to be deposited into the Highway Trust Fund in that fiscal year.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 621 proposed by Senator Paul.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 621 under the order of 9/15/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 14 - 84. Record Vote Number: 136.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 621 under the order of 9/15/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 14 - 84. Record Vote Number: 136.
